chunk:
Savor Beauty Lemongrass Hydrating Toning Mist

Brand: Savor Beauty

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Cymbopogon Citratus Floral Water

Directions: Three ways to use: Mist face 3-5 times before applying Savor Beauty Serum and Truffle Face Cream. Combine serum, cream, two spritzes of Toning Mist in the palm of hand. Massage onto face and ne

age onto face and neck. Mist face to set makeup.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
